content: **note ** the yarn is taken from the inside of the first skein then the outside of the second skein because the blanket is worked in rounds the corners can have a tendency to pull crooked you can wash and block the blanket to help make it straighter **materials ** butterfly col 4 crochet hook 6 5 mm **yarn usage ** 400g 2 skeins **measurements ** approx 81x81 cm **crochet gauge ** 19 sts x 19 row = 10 x 10 cm **abbreviations ** st s stitch es magic_ring magic_ring chain chain stitch single_crochet single_crochet chain-space chain space
